QuestData.Title: Brotherly Love
QuestData.Description:
Maiev will be somewhere in the prison. I found her discarded armor on my way here.
Let's split up to search the cells more quickly.$B$BWe must find her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Maiev Shadowsong in Black Rook Prison.
QuestData.RewardText: <Maiev's face is bruised, her lips cracked, and her body covered in scars. She looks thin and ragged, but she moves with purpose.>$B$BFor weeks they tried to break me. Amateurs!$B$BI kept my silence. I counted the minutes, measured their steps, and listened to the voices beyond my cell.$B$BI have been waiting for my chance to escape, and to strike back at my captors.$B$BNow, you bring my armor AND my blade. My salvation will be followed by bloodshed.$B$B<Maiev smiles.>
